DOC.brief_summary: This study open-label , multi-site study . The total number subject 200 . The duration study approximately four week . The primary objective ass percentage lapse contact wearer , discontinue use contact lenses great six month successfully re-fit senofilcon A , reusable 2-weekly replacement daily wear lens ( spherical toric design ) .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation Lapsed Contact Lens Wearers Who Are Re-fit Into Senofilcon A Contact Lenses
